definition: Enter your 6 character site code. Codes can be found in the standards section of the MarineGEO protocol website: https://marinegeo.github.io/standards/
The name of the specific location where the sample was collected; e.g., Curlew Cay
The transect at the location the sample came from: 1, 2, or 3
The year the sample was collected in the field
The month the sample was collected in the field
The day the sample was collected in the field
The year the sample was processed in the lab
The month the sample was processed in the lab
The day the sample was processed in the lab
Name(s) of data collector(s)
Full name of data entry person
Any additional notes regarding observations, context, or concerns about the data
The distance along the transect that the sample was collected (from 1-50 m)
Scientific name using standard scientific nomenclature. If the species cannot be identified to species, report genus or higher.
Any additional notes regarding observations, context, or concerns about the data.
Latitude of the transect beginning, in decimal degrees (to five decimal places)
Longitude of the transect beginning, in decimal degrees (to five decimal places)
Latitude of the transect ending, in decimal degrees (to five decimal places)
Latitude of the transect ending, in decimal degrees (to five decimal places)
The transect's minimum depth in meters.
The transect's maximum depth in meters
The filename of the image associated with the sample with the file extension included (e.g., "usa-mda_site1_t1_q1-unknown-seagrass.jpg")
The full name of the person processing the sample (no initials; ONLY one name per sample)
The year the sample was retrieved from the field
The month the sample was retrieved from the field
The day the sample was retrieved from the field
The year the instrument was deployed in the field
The month the instrument was deployed in the field
The day the instrument was deployed in the field
The time the instrument was deployed in the field, recorded in 24-hour format and in the local time
The habitat type of the site location, such as "seagrass", "coral reef", "oyster reef", "rocky reef", "mangrove"
The institution responsible for sampling or deployment
Deployment latitude, in decimal degrees (to five decimal places)
Deployment longitude, in decimal degrees (to five decimal places)
First name of the point of contact for this dataset
Surname of the point of contact for this dataset
